original_text: But ye know the proof of him, that, as a son with the father, he hath served with me in the gospel.
korean_text: 디모데의 연단을 너희가 아나니 자식이 아버지에게 함같이 나와 함께 복음을 위하여 수고하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But ye know the proof of him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 여러분은 그의 증거를 알고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that, as a son with the father
